entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Kugaaruk
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 02:22 AM MST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -33.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kugaaruk Airport 04:00 AM MST Saturday 25 February 2023
Temperature: -33.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 70 %
Wind Chill: -51
Dewpoint: -36.9°C
Wind: WSW 35 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. High minus 31.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud. Blowing snow at times early this morning. Wind southwest 40 km/h diminishing to 20 this afternoon. High minus 31. Wind chill minus 55 this morning and minus 45 this afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 37.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 37. Wind chill near minus 48. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 35.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 35. Wind chill minus 46 in the morning and minus 53 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Saturday 25 February 2023
